publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2324 Mike Pringle: Congratulations to ACE IT on Winning the Nominet Best Practice Challenge Award—That the Parliament congratulates Age Concern Edinburgh Information Technology (ACE IT) on winning the prestigious Nominet Best Practice Challenge Award 2008; recognises the excellent work that ACE IT does in introducing Edinburgh’s older generation to information and computer technology, and wishes the project all the best in the future, both in its continued work in Edinburgh and as a showcase representative for the United Kingdom at the next Internet Governance Forum in December 2008.

S3M-2324 Congratulations to ACE IT on Winning the Nominet Best Practice Challenge Award (lodged on 11 July 2008) Kenneth Gibson*, Jamie McGrigor*, Mike Rumbles*, Bill Kidd*, Jim Tolson*, Sandra White*, Jamie Stone*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Robin Harper*
S3M-2324 Congratulations to ACE IT on Winning the Nominet Best Practice Challenge Award (lodged on 11 July 2008) Gil Paterson*
